item.title: CVE-2024-29793|2024-06-04T17:58:15.115Z -- mailmunch -- mailchimp%20forms%20by%20mailmunch
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MailMunch MailChimp Forms by MailMunch allows Stored XSS.This issue affects MailChimp Forms by MailMunch: from n/a through 3.2.2.
